summary: E-commerce website for a handcrafted products store (craftstorebyplaam66.com) selling bangles/accessories/handmade items, with product browsing, cart/checkout, payments, search/categories, and a clean mobile-friendly UI.
architectural_notes: Clean minimalist UI: white background, big readable fonts, strong product photography
Core site structure: Home/Shop → Product pages → Cart/Checkout → About/Contact (User account optional)
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal craft store wordmark logo, black/charcoal on transparent background (craftstore-logo.dim_512x256.png)
- Minimalist hero banner with white background and warm neutral abstract shapes (craftstore-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
- Product photo-style image of red bangles on a clean white backdrop (product-bangles-red.dim_800x800.png)
- Product photo-style image of a leather handbag on a clean white backdrop (product-leather-bag.dim_800x800.png)
- Product photo-style image of assorted handmade accessories on a clean white backdrop (product-accessories-mix.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create the storefront information architecture and navigation with these pages/routes: Home/Shop (product listing), Product Details, Cart, Checkout, About, and Contact. The header must include a category navigation control and a search input, and must be usable on mobile.

Implement a product showcase on the Home/Shop page that displays products as clean cards with: product photo, name, price, and an “Add to Cart” button. Include example categories such as bangles, accessories, and handmade products.
Add Product Details pages that show a larger product image, name, price, description, category, and an “Add to Cart” action.

Implement cart functionality: users can add items to the cart, view and edit the cart (change quantity, remove items), see subtotal/total, and proceed to checkout. Cart must persist during a browsing session (page refresh should not lose cart).

Implement a checkout flow that supports: cart review, collecting basic customer details (name, email, phone, shipping address), selecting a payment option, and placing an order. After placing an order, show an order confirmation screen with an order ID and summary.

Add payments integration using Stripe Checkout, configured to allow available methods such as credit/debit cards and, where supported by Stripe account/region, UPI (e.g., GPay/PhonePe), wallets, and netbanking. Record payment result against the order (Paid/Failed/Pending) and show the status on the confirmation page.
Implement search and category-based filtering on the Home/Shop page. Search must filter by product name (and optionally description) and category filtering must be selectable and clearable.
Ensure the UI is mobile-friendly and responsive: tap-friendly buttons, easy scrolling, readable typography, and layouts that adapt cleanly from phone to desktop.

Apply a clean minimalist visual theme consistent across the app: white base, warm neutral accents (e.g., sand/terracotta/charcoal), large readable fonts, generous spacing, and product-forward layouts suitable for a handcrafted store.

Generate and add required static images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (logo in header, hero/banner on Home/Shop, and product placeholder images used by the seeded catalog).

new_feature_requests.summary: Product showcase (shop/home) with product cards showing photo, name, price, and Add to Cart
Cart and full checkout flow (select product → review cart → place order)
Payment integration supporting cards, UPI (GPay/PhonePe), and wallets/netbanking (as available)
Responsive mobile-friendly design (easy scrolling and tap-friendly buttons)

Create backend product catalog endpoints/data that the frontend uses to render the shop: list products, get product by ID, and list categories. Seed the catalog with a small set of example handcrafted products (bangles/accessories/handmade) including name, price, category, description, and image reference.
